content: the rosie tee is a fun crochet top with lacy and dainty sleeves it is a great top for any time of the year wear is alone in the warmer months and layered under a coat or sweater in the cold months **what s included ** 14 page printable pdf download written instructions for women s sizes xs-3x photos for reference links to helpful stitch tutorials **pattern difficulty ** intermediate **yarn ** expression fiber arts oasis fingering #1 **sizing ** xs 28-30 bust 831 yards s 32-34 880 yards m 36-38 935 yards l 40-42 1032 yards xl 44-46 1167 yards 2x 48-50 1250 yards 3x 52-54 1300 yards all of my patterns are thoroughly tested by experienced pattern testers and fellow designers to ensure you get a pattern that is easy to read and follow all of my patterns are in us terms due to the nature of the pdf files sales i will not refund any patterns once they have been downloaded however i am always available via email or a message here on ravelry if you have any questions about the patterns **new to crocheting garments or need some extra help with them sign up for the free ultimate guide to crocheting garments email series ** 2 you may sell what you produce from my patterns but the pattern itself is copyrighted and may not be shared or changed in part or in whole my photos are also copyrighted and may never be used to sell the products you make 1 https //www expressionfiberarts com/products/rosie-tee-two-brothers-blankets-collaboration html 2 https //www subscribepage com/crochetinggarmentsguide
